1.title: Bride Wars
1.plot: In the season premiere, Ashley butts heads with her future mother-in-law, Phyllis. Two new married WAGS are brought into the group but take an instant dislike to one another. Claudia and her rival Ashley attend a big game where their men play against each other, the winner of which goes to the Super Bowl.

2.title: Party Girl 2
2.plot: The girls take a trip to the Bahamas, but things escalate when Ashley confronts Claudia about some racy pictures from her past. Hencha breaks girl code when she flirts with a baseball player that Astrid already has her eye on.

3.title: Dueling Matchmakers 2
3.plot: Hencha goes ballistic when Faven sets up Astrid instead of her; Darnell realizes that she needs to re-prioritize her career; when Julius signs with a new team, Claudia gets concerned that his new teammates will be a bad influence on him.

4.title: Hunch's Revenge
4.plot: In the wake of their huge fight, Hencha gets revenge on Astrid; Ashley dreads breaking the news to her opinionated soon-to-be mother-in-law that they will have a destination weddings.

5.title: LA Bachelorette Bound
5.plot: Hencha's opinionated mother comes to town and pries into her dating life, offering unsolicited advice; Astrid hosts an anniversary party for her swimwear line where she finds out that Kayla has been acting two-faced.

6.title: Double Ds
6.plot: Ashley's party continues, and Phil has his own night out. Darnell interviews an athlete for her podcast. Claudia agrees to do Astrid's photo-shoot but cancels with short notice.

7.title: Hurricane Phyllis
7.plot: Kayla admits to Faven that her marriage is on the rocks. Darnell finds out that Metisha used to date her new guy. Ashley and Phyllis get into a huge fight the day before her wedding when Phyllis questions Ashley's mothering skills.

8.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
8.plot: Ashley and Phil finally tie the knot, but not without mother-in-law drama. Hencha suspects she may be pregnant. Tension between Kayla and Eric threatens their marriage.

8.title: Girls Be Trippin
8.plot: In the season finale, all hell breaks loose on a trip to Croatia when the tension between the girls comes to a head. Darnell is tired of Ashley's lack of consideration for her feelings and finally calls her out on it.

9.title: WAGS Miami Reunion Special
9.plot: After an explosive season, the "WAGS Miami" cast return to handle their unfinished business, air some dirty laundry and share some big news. Hosted by former NFL star Tiki Barber, this hour-long reunion special re-defines "leaving it all on the field," and reveals the truth behind some of this season's craziest moments.

101.title: Welcome to Miami
101.plot: In the series premiere, Darnell invites notorious Miami party girls Hencha and Metisha to her engagement brunch. After Claudia makes a negative comment about them to Ashley, the girls confront her and the conflict takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Metisha learns that her ex-boyfriend Larry English and his girlfriend, LA WAG Nicole, just got engaged.

102.title: Ratchet by association
102.plot: Tension between Hencha and Claudia over a guy they both used to date comes to a head. On the heels of buying a new house and planning a big party to celebrate their engagement, Darnell is thrown for a loop when Reshad makes an unexpected announcement. Astrid enlists the help of Metisha and Claudia for her first runway show, but quickly regrets asking them to be involved.

103.title: Girl Code
103.plot: The girls take a trip to the Bahamas, but things escalate when Ashley confronts Claudia about some racy pictures from her past. Hencha breaks girl code when she flirts with a baseball player that Astrid already has her eye on.

104.title: Birthday Brawl
104.plot: Hencha confronts Vanessa when she hears a rumor about her man. Darnell tries to patch things up with Claudia following the drama in the Bahamas. Claudia heads up to Green Bay to support Julius as he deals with rumors of his own.

105.title: What Would Vesus Do?
105.plot: Darnell decides she can no longer be financially dependent, but when she takes the steps to start a business, Reshad questions their relationship. When Ashley takes a trip home, her Dad questions Phil about his intentions for the future of their relationship. Metisha encourages Vanessa to make things right between her and Hencha.

106.title: Put a Ring on It
106.plot: Phil pops the question during a staycation at the iconic Versace Mansion before he leaves for the season. Hencha's new love interest is in town and she hopes it might be the beginning of something more serious. Darnell confides in Claudia about her relationship with Reshad, prompting Claudia to question her own future with Julius.

107.title: Ring Toss
107.plot: Ashley starts to prep for her wedding, while Darnell struggles with some devastating news. Metisha goes on a date with a pro boxer. With all of the guys gone for the season, the girls take a trip to Croatia.

imdb.title: WAGS Miami
plot: The girls have different problems witj their boyfriends , and they are helping each other , but the group is not perfect::Cristiana Lance
